name: Bildupphovsrätt i Sverige (Visual Copyright in Sweden)
goal: Collect and distribute remuneration on the basis of copyright legislation and similar legislation on behalf of visual authors and estates.
interests: Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market
euInitiatives: Digital agenda. Copyright initiativs. Cultural agenda. Media agenda. International trade agreements.
